channel.title: Important Question
channel.description:
Okay guys on my server i want to add more drops to the monsters so i went to npcdrops.cfg i added more drops
like
/*King Black dragon*/ npcdrop = 50 1747 1 100 npcdrop = 50 4675 1 50 npcdrop = 50 1540 1 50 npcdrop = 50 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 50 2577 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2581 1 3 npcdrop = 50 536 1 100 npcdrop = 50 2621 1 1
problem is tho!
it told me the d claws that i added wouldnt work idk why? and like i added a phat to the kalphite queen that wouldnt work too
also my server doesnt have an auto restarter so does this mean the times its gonna drop the item will that mean if it dropped a dfs 1 time will it be only 1 time for the whole time untill i restart server?

item.title: Important Question
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:10, topic:360289”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=456720.msg3342752#msg3342752 date=1284519676]

/*King Black dragon*/ npcdrop = 50 1747 1 100 npcdrop = 50 4675 1 50 npcdrop = 50 1540 1 50 npcdrop = 50 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 50 2577 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2581 1 3 npcdrop = 50 536 1 100 npcdrop = 50 2621 1 1

Should of fixed the spacing error
[/quote]
Actually it wouldn’t, you can’t C & P the tabs, they turn into spaces :|[/quote]

o, i c didn’t kno that

Read full topic

/*King Black dragon*/ npcdrop = 50 1747 1 100 npcdrop = 50 4675 1 50 npcdrop = 50 1540 1 50 npcdrop = 50 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 50 2577 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2581 1 3 npcdrop = 50 536 1 100 npcdrop = 50 2621 1 1

item.title: Important Question
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Yes, your server will keep dropping the item. The 1 will either mean amount or % chance, depending which value it represents. Amount meaning how many are dropped in a single drop, not how many times it can be dropped total.

Your second problem would most likely be spacing. In configuration files(.cfg), you have to use the tab key instead of the spacebar key.

Read full topic

i hit compile worked fine then i hit run.bat

and i got like an error
and the error was for adding a new npcdrop to the monster.

so im pretty sure at this point theres a process to add items to npcdrop instead of just typing in npcitem = id xx xx xx…

im sorry but your answer was like wtf lmfao just wanting to make sure![/quote]

It’ll keep dropping.

No, it’ll keep dropping, even after you restart your server.
